summary: NVIDIA GAAP OpEx guidance has been: Q2 FY26 $5.7B, Q3 FY26 $5.9B, Q4 FY26 $6.7B. Actuals come in below guidance. QoQ actual growth ~7.5%.
content: GAAP OpEx Actual: Q3 FY25 $4.287B, Q4 FY25 $4.689B, Q1 FY26 $5.030B, Q2 FY26 $5.413B, Q3 FY26 $5.839B. Q4 FY26 guided at $6.7B. Guidance vs actual: Q2 guided $5.7B actual $5.413B (-5%), Q3 guided $5.9B actual $5.839B (-1%). FY26 total opex growth "high-30%" range. Central estimate for Q1 FY27 guidance: ~$7.0B.
